metadata.title: CVE-2023-29452 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Currently, geomap configuration (Administration -> General -> Geographicalmaps) allows using HTML in the field “Attribution text” when selected“Other” Tile provider.

criterions.comment: zabbix: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
